= Project Description =
  * 10 second elevator pitch (how do you sell this to an early adopter?): This product is intended help teachers (in higher education and beyond) use blogs as an educational tool. It provides a specialist RSS feed reader that can apply educational specific metadata to student blogs, posts and comments, i.e. record marks, track submission or simply add teacher notes.
